allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add session summary workthrough

- Summarize all 13 commits from today''s session
- Document completed features and bug fixes
- List all working pages with their functionality

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement Full-Text Search with PostgreSQL GIN indexes

- Add tsvector columns with auto-update triggers
- Add GIN indexes for FTS and trigram similarity
- Use plainto_tsquery for safe special character handling
- Add escapeIlike function to prevent wildcard injection
- Support Korean text with pg_trgm similarity matching
- Relevance ranking with ts_rank and similarity

Gemini review: Fixed tsquery syntax error risk, ILIKE injection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: integrate Bitbucket data into /stories skill

- Add Bitbucket commits/PRs/developer activity to /stories context
- Add Epic-related commits and PRs to /stories list
- Update /sync skill with detailed Bitbucket options
- Update sync_bitbucket.py with API token auth and auto-discovery

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
